nuhker

Class Func

  • java.lang.Object
    • nuhker.Func

  • public class Func
extends java.lang.Object
    Here are concentrated some simple functions (oops, methods) we need here and there. Basically said, these are simple bit-banging things, thus nothing complex.
    Author:
    coder037@xyz.ee

    • Method Detail

      • variateTheTime

        public static int variateTheTime(int base)
        Method delay(long milliSeconds) introduces a couple of seconds delay between the internet requests, not to overload the services used. For conspirative reasons, the delay is non-static and varies a little bit each time.
        Parameters:
        base - time in millisecs to variate a little bit

      • delay

        public static void delay(int someNumber)
        Method delay (int milliseconds) keeps internet requests a couple of seconds apart. This is in order not to abuse services.
        Parameters:
        long - milliSeconds to wait

      • isSensible

        public static boolean isSensible(java.lang.String suspect)
        The method recognizes Google promotional links and removes these from actual data. There are 4 previously known links. We compare the argument with these found. On the firstfound, we break the cycle and return a flag to the calling program.
        Parameters:
        - - a "link"/sitename to discard as invalid data
        Returns:
        - the decision whether to discard the initial parameter

      • doSomeBookkeepingOnThe

        public static void doSomeBookkeepingOnThe(java.lang.String suspect)

      • as2ASN

        static java.lang.String as2ASN(java.lang.String source)
        A formal conversion method AS:12345 -> 12345. Several checks and consequential format transformations are included to be VERY SURE about our assumptions how Google uses its data at GSB.
        Parameters:
        The - number or an ASN in numeric form (12345)
        Returns:
        Google proprietary AS:12345 format converted to int 12345

      • asn2Colon

        static java.lang.String asn2Colon(java.lang.String source)
        The method does the conversion from int ASN to a Google preferred AS:12345 format
        Parameters:
        The - number or an ASN in integer format (12345)
        Returns:
        the same ASN with "AS:" prepended -> AS:12345 to be directly usable against GSB

      • publicizeStatistics

        public static void publicizeStatistics()
        The method will publicize some status data otherwise kept in the DBze. E.g. we call it before killing the program and elsewhere
        Parameters:
        none -

      • checkTheAuthorship

        public static java.lang.String checkTheAuthorship(java.lang.String argument)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        This is the wrapper class to check the Autorship. It does nothing except taking the proposed author's name and calling a cryptographic validation calculateHash(String argument) of that. The idea is that if you PREVIOUSLY know the author's name, you can prove it but if you don't know it, the program will not share its authors name, too.
        Parameters:
        argument - Author's name or what you think it is
        Returns:
        String message whether you guessed it or not
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
